XXksnarm_u:2: KNarm_1.1 yenedaṃ svecchayā sarvaṃ māyayā mohitaṃ jagat /
XXksnarm_u:18: KNarm_1.9 purā hateṣu daityeṣu viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā /
XXksnarm_u:28: KNarm_1.14 jagati brāhmaṇānāṃ ca vṛtticchede tvayā kṛte /
XXksnarm_u:30: KNarm_1.15 daityakṣaye kṛte yasmādbhavatā divi roditam /
XXksnarm_u:31: tasmāttvaṃ diviro nāma bhuvi khyāto bhaviṣyasi //
XXksnarm_u:32: KNarm_1.16 maṣī sakalamā yasya kālī kavalitākhilā /
XXksnarm_u:59: KNarm_1.29 kaliḥ prayāto dravatāṃ maṣīrūpeṇa tiṣṭhati /
XXksnarm_u:72: luṇṭhyā vadhyāśca pūjyā ye sarva ityavadanmadāt //
XXksnarm_u:77: KNarm_1.38 sa vṛtaḥ sevakaśataiḥ sadā dambhaharārcane /
XXksnarm_u:80: hyaḥ kiyanto mayā dattāḥ prāyasthā vijayeśvare //
XXksnarm_u:106: KNarm_1.52 so 'bravīttvāmahaṃ śrutvā sthitaṃ śaktimatāṃ dhuri /
XXksnarm_u:114: KNarm_1.56 sa cāsti bhuvi vikhyātaḥ kāyastho bhavatā samaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:116: KNarm_1.57 brahmahatyā na gaṇyante govadheṣu kathaiva kā /
XXksnarm_u:118: KNarm_1.58 anye 'pi santi sarvatra tadvidhastu na labhyate /
XXksnarm_u:119: nītaḥ svajanako yena nidhanaṃ bandhane dhanī //
XXksnarm_u:120: KNarm_1.59 yadi nāma bhavatpuṇyaiḥ sa sameṣyati madgirā /
XXksnarm_u:124: KNarm_1.61 tataḥ sa satvaraṃ dvitrairādarāya gatāgataiḥ /
XXksnarm_u:133: KNarm_1.65 sa mahāntaṃ samāsādya duḥsahaṃ daṃśanaṃ viṭam /
XXksnarm_u:177: KNarm_1.86 sa prāpya pradadau dīrghāṃ śaratṣaṇmāsakalpanām /
XXksnarm_u:181: KNarm_1.88 asmindevagṛhe te te prasiddhāḥ paripālakāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:189: KNarm_1.92 tathā hi tāmrajaḥ pūrvaṃ mahān nīto ghaṭo mayā /
XXksnarm_u:191: KNarm_1.93 kālena ghaṇṭāṃ vikrīya tadaṃśena kṛtā ghaṭī /
XXksnarm_u:192: krameṇa bhakṣitā sāpi kṛtā śeṣeṇa ghaṇṭikā //
XXksnarm_u:193: KNarm_1.94 ciraṃ sañcūrṇitā sāpi kṛtā sūkṣmajhilīmalī /
XXksnarm_u:195: KNarm_1.95 evaṃ caturbhujā luṇṭhiḥ kriyate śivapūjayā /
XXksnarm_u:217: KNarm_1.105 śiśire yasya nāṅgāraṃ pradaduḥ prātiveśminaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:231: KNarm_1.112 vacā jatumayī rakṣā kṣurikā yogapaṭṭakaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:245: KNarm_1.119 nopayogī phalotpattau doṣodyogī tu kevalam /
XXksnarm_u:246: aśo[kaḥ] satataṃ rogī niyogī jayati prabhuḥ //
XXksnarm_u:250: kā nāma gaṇanā tasya nṛṣu sarvāparādhiṣu //
XXksnarm_u:252: iti tasya mukhādghoraṃ na cacāla vacaḥ sadā //
XXksnarm_u:253: KNarm_1.123 pañcaṣāḥ satataṃ tasya karabhā iva bhārikāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:261: KNarm_1.127 nityaṃ māṃsaghṛtāhāraḥ sa rājapuruṣe sthite /
XXksnarm_u:266: KNarm_1.129 sa mukto bandhanāttena kṣipraṃ dvādaśavārṣikāt /
XXksnarm_u:268: KNarm_1.130 kṛttāṅguṣṭhaḥ sa vāmena pāṇinā diviro rahaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:286: KNarm_1.139 dhūsaro maladigdhāṅgaḥ sa piśāca ivotthitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:293: KNarm_1.142 acirādatha saṃvṛtte gṛhe tasya mahādhane /
XXksnarm_u:297: KNarm_1.144 hāro bhārāyate hematāṭaṅkaṃ me na vallabham /
XXksnarm_u:299: KNarm_1.145 ekaivaikāvalī kāntā laliteyaṃ priyā mama /
XXksnarm_u:300: iti darpagirā tasyā nābhavat kasya vismayaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:303: KNarm_1.147 yā papau yācitaṃ cāmaṃ bhagnasyūtāśmabhājane /
XXksnarm_u:313: KNarm_2.3 cārusaurabhaliptāṅgī na sā jagrāha kañcukam /
XXksnarm_u:317: KNarm_2.5 ayatnasādhyāṃ tāṃ vīkṣya viṭā lalitalocanām /
XXksnarm_u:325: KNarm_2.9 śūnyāṃ devakuṭīṃ gatvā prasiddhāḥ pāradārikāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:327: KNarm_2.10 eko 'vadattatra viṭaḥ sulabhaiṣā na saṃśayaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:328: khalvāṭaṃ tundilaṃ vṛddhaṃ svapatiṃ sahate katham //
XXksnarm_u:331: KNarm_2.12 sutoparodhovandhyāyā nāsyā na ca vayaḥkṣayaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:332: na ca duḥkhābhibhūtāsau rāgadagdhā na lakṣyate //
XXksnarm_u:333: KNarm_2.13 etairhi doṣairnāyānti duḥśīlā api yoṣitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:347: itthaṃ kā nāma na mayā kṛtā śīlaparāṅmukhī //
XXksnarm_u:356: KNarm_2.23 na kālo yadi nāmāsau tat kiṃ jīvanahṛnnṛṇām /
XXksnarm_u:358: KNarm_2.24 kiyanto 'dya mṛtāḥ kutra pṛcchanniti muhurmuhuḥ /
XXksnarm_u:371: KNarm_2.30 yā mātā vaśyayogānāṃ jārāṇāṃ siddhadūtikā /
XXksnarm_u:374: purāṇapuṃścalī sā hi jāhnavīṃ manyate tṛṇam //
XXksnarm_u:383: re re dāsīsutetyādi janaṃ kopena bhartsayan //
XXksnarm_u:396: KNarm_2.42 bhābhūto kuṅkumārdrau ^ ^ ^ ^ ^ _ rainaisaddṛśau _ _ _ _ ^ _ _ ^ ^ ^ musimusi lakṣaṇau phenaparvau /
XXksnarm_u:397: _ _ _ _ ^ _ _ maṇikanakadharau divyagandhānuliptau saṅgrāmeṇa praviṣṭau palupa ^ ^ ^ nau labhyatāṃ rājyalakṣmīḥ //
XXksnarm_u:400: KNarm_2.44 ityādi dattvā bālānāṃ nityaṃ phalahakeṣu saḥ /
XXksnarm_u:413: KNarm_2.50 nāyaṃ kiñcinmahābhāgo jānāti na ca budhyate /
XXksnarm_u:414: iti no bhejire lajjā vivastrā api tasya tāḥ //
XXksnarm_u:417: KNarm_2.52 sa bījāśva ivotsṛṣṭo vaḍavāmaṇḍale yuvā /
XXksnarm_u:419: KNarm_2.53 bhrātṛjāyāṃ svasāraṃ ca tāṃ ca bhāryāṃ mṛgīdṛśam /
XXksnarm_u:425: dhūrtāḥ svādhīnatāṃ prāptāṃ svairiṇīṃ tāṃ siṣevire //
XXksnarm_u:434: KNarm_2.60 idaṃ suruciraṃ vastraṃ krītamābharaṇañca te /
XXksnarm_u:446: KNarm_2.66 tataḥ prabhāte prasṛte bhūrjabhāṇḍādike puraḥ /
XXksnarm_u:453: KNarm_2.69 bhrānto gṛhaśataṃ tūrṇaṃ bhārākrānta ivocchvasan /
XXksnarm_u:458: ājīvamīśvaraḥ śūlī yena na tyajyate janaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:459: KNarm_2.72 sa vaidyaḥ kālakūṭo vā vyālo vetāla eva vā /
XXksnarm_u:461: KNarm_2.73 sa vaidya eva kupito vāyurāyuḥkṣayaṅkaraḥ /
XXksnarm_u:464: sthitaṃ bhuktaṃ nu pītaṃ nu vaidyeneti pralāpinaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:467: janatā yāti yanmāndyaṃ tadvaidyasya śaneḥ phalam //
XXksnarm_u:469: nṛṇāṃ tridoṣakṛtsatyaṃ vaidya eva na tu jvaraḥ //
XXksnarm_u:472: KNarm_2.78 upasṛtya sa pasparśa stanau tasyāḥ susaṃhatau /
XXksnarm_u:474: KNarm_2.79 laṅghanaṃ sahate naiṣā hitaṃ śūle na vṛṃhaṇam /
XXksnarm_u:475: karotu mama cintāsu sarvāhāraṃ mayā saha //
XXksnarm_u:476: KNarm_2.80 jaḍā hyasyāḥ sthitā buddhirdhātuśca viṣamaḥ sthitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:478: KNarm_2.81 ityukte vaidyanāthena strībhiḥ tūrṇaṃ sasambhramam /
XXksnarm_u:487: KNarm_2.85 na kaścidupakāraṃ te manyate śatravaśca te /
XXksnarm_u:488: santi tebhyo bhayaṃ deharakṣāyāṃ naiva bādhate //
XXksnarm_u:489: KNarm_2.86 durbalo dṛśyase bhrātaryūṣaṃ na kuruṣe katham /
XXksnarm_u:490: apyasti kāmalā nūnaṃ tāṃ mantreṇa nudāmyaham //
XXksnarm_u:494: dhūrto dhūlipaṭe cakre rāśicakraṃ mudhaiva saḥ //
XXksnarm_u:503: KNarm_2.92 tataḥ prayāte gaṇake cintite śukrapūjane /
XXksnarm_u:508: tāsāṃ madhyān mṛtāḥ pañca pañca śeṣāḥ sthitāḥ khale //
XXksnarm_u:513: KNarm_2.97 pādāntike ca prahitaṃ tasya pradhanapatrakam /
XXksnarm_u:514: baddhaṃ mayā tatkalatraṃ mudritaṃ sakalaṃ gṛham //
XXksnarm_u:516: pradadau māsavṛttyaiva te mayā tadgṛhe dhṛtāḥ //
XXksnarm_u:545: veśyākāminiyogivañcanaguruḥ sadvṛttaśūnyo guruś citraṃ sarvaguruḥ śivoditamahāśikṣāsu nityaṃ laghuḥ //
XXksnarm_u:546: KNarm_2.113 api nāma sa jāyeta pavitracaritaḥ kṣitau /
XXksnarm_u:550: KNarm_2.115 rakṣāyai nijabhāryāyāḥ sampadāṃ ca vivṛddhaye /
XXksnarm_u:559: KNarm_2.119 karoti praśrayaṃ vakti madhuraṃ diviraḥ puraḥ /
XXksnarm_u:567: KNarm_2.123 nūnaṃ niśi bhagāpānaṃ karoti diviraḥ sadā /
XXksnarm_u:571: KNarm_2.125 vipraṃ puraḥ samāyāntaṃ thūtkṛtya tvaritaḥ punaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:583: KNarm_2.131 adhomukhā vimānebhyaḥ patanto divi rodanam /
XXksnarm_u:585: KNarm_2.132 jāmātuḥ śrīmato dṛṣṭvā sa gṛhaṃ harṣanirbharaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:596: KNarm_2.137 brāhmaṇyādye hatā naiva rāmeṇa brahmarākṣasāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:598: KNarm_2.138 kṛtaḥ parājito jetā jayī yaiśca parājitaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:600: KNarm_2.139 ante narakapālairye vṛtā vetālatāṃ gatāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:619: KNarm_3.2 khaṭikā karaṇī haimī pārato ratnamūṭikā /
XXksnarm_u:623: KNarm_3.4 patākā vyajanaṃ kūrcaḥ puṣpalakṣāṇi ṣoḍaśa /
XXksnarm_u:625: KNarm_3.5 sruksruvau samidho darbhā lājāḥ siddhārtakā ghṛtam /
XXksnarm_u:655: KNarm_3.20 eko dvau bahavaḥ paścānninyuste bhastrayā tathā /
XXksnarm_u:658: KNarm_3.21 tataḥ svabhaginī raṇḍā bālaiva vrataśālinī /
XXksnarm_u:672: KNarm_3.28 hāreṇa kiṃ sumadhyāyāḥ sukeśyāḥ kusumena kim /
XXksnarm_u:674: KNarm_3.29 kiṃ dharmo yatra no raṇḍā dhiksukhaṃ raṇḍayā vinā /
XXksnarm_u:676: KNarm_3.30 raṇḍā vilokya taruṇaṃ karoti bhrukuṭiṃ mṛṣā /
XXksnarm_u:681: sravantī nirbharaṃ reto raṇḍā dhenuḥ payo yathā //
XXksnarm_u:682: KNarm_3.33 gauraḥ supīvaro dhatte raṇḍāyā muṇḍito bhagaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:685: yadi nāma rate śakto raṇḍāṃ toṣayituṃ na vā //
XXksnarm_u:686: KNarm_3.35 śrāddheṣu mugdhaviprāṇāṃ jaṭināṃ ca tapasvinām /
XXksnarm_u:700: KNarm_3.42 gatvā gurugṛhaṃ raṇḍā patyuḥ parvadine satī /
XXksnarm_u:709: KNarm_3.46 tataḥ praviviśuste te dīkṣāsamayino narāḥ /
XXksnarm_u:713: KNarm_3.48 ihaiva suciraṃ nātha yāgavyagre tvayi sthite /
XXksnarm_u:715: KNarm_3.49 ya eṣa prathito loke gṛhakṛtye mahattamaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:717: KNarm_3.50 brahmahatyādi pāpaṃ yanniḥsaṃkhyaṃ tasya vidyate /
XXksnarm_u:719: KNarm_3.51 manyate sa tṛṇaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasaṃhārapātakam /
XXksnarm_u:720: yato mūrdhni tvayā hastastasya pañcaphaṇo dhṛtaḥ //
XXksnarm_u:721: KNarm_3.52 tvatprasādātsamuttīrṇāṃ sa kāmapi daśāṃ śritaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:732: KNarm_3.57 tailonmṛṣṭe manāksneho vadane na tu cakṣuṣi /
XXksnarm_u:734: KNarm_3.58 yadi sadbhāvinī *vaiśyā yadi kālaḥ kṛpāparaḥ /
XXksnarm_u:756: hastaṃ dattvā bhage vṛddho nidhānamiva rakṣati //
XXksnarm_u:758: rātrau vamati tatsarvaṃ bhajate vā viṣūcikām //
XXksnarm_u:759: KNarm_3.69 śuṣkacarmopamaṃ vṛddhaṃ madhuparke kṣaṇaṃ patim /
XXksnarm_u:760: sajane taruṇī dṛṣṭvā hrītā yāti rasātalam //
XXksnarm_u:774: KNarm_3.76 tato dinānte vipulāṃ kṛtvāgre śivakuṇḍikām /
XXksnarm_u:775: guruṇā saha te śiṣyāḥ papurbhuktottaraṃ ciram //
XXksnarm_u:784: KNarm_3.81 tataḥ kṣībo guruḥ kiṃ citsvakāvyaṃ deśabhāṣayā /
XXksnarm_u:790: KNarm_3.84 śanaiḥ prayāte rātryardhe vinaṣṭe dīpamaṇḍale /
XXksnarm_u:806: KNarm_3.92 iti bruvāṇe tanmitre taiḥ śiṣyaiḥ sahite gurau /
XXksnarm_u:808: KNarm_3.93 aho nu kāladaurātmyādghoratā kiyatī kaleḥ /
XXksnarm_u:812: KNarm_3.95 sa rājñā hṛtasarvasvaḥ praklinno bandhane ciram /
XXksnarm_u:822: KNarm_3.100 aho bata muhūrtena bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
XXksnarm_u:824: KNarm_3.101 svayamutthāya yātāyāṃ jāyāyāṃ nirdhano 'tha saḥ /
XXksnarm_u:827: piśāca iva duṣprekṣyo dinaireva babhūva saḥ //
XXksnarm_u:849: KNarm_3.113 iti diviraniyogivrātaduśceṣṭitānāṃ kusṛticaritacarcā narmamālā kṛteyam /
XXksnarm_u:850: api sujanavinodāyombhitā hāsyasiddhyai kathayati phalabhūtaṃ sarvalokopadeśam //
